name: Hacker Connect
description:
With the help of only your hands and your keyboard, your goal is to connect to the mainframe by typing random words as fast as you possibly can. It is not until the green bar is completely filled you may have some rest.

If you aren't satisfied with your score the first time, you can always replay it and try to get a better score than the last time.

This game was developed during a 9-day period in the middle of June as a submission for Lost Relic Games' very first game jam. With the theme "Connected" our team decided to make a typing game where you are trying to connect to the mainframe as fast as possible while also practicing your typing skills.

Programmer: Adrian Agren

Pixel Artist: OLTEANU

Composer: Exopulse

*credit to Zeh Fernando for the font
